Package dk.via.sep.client.networking.userClient

Interface UserClient

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Subject
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    UserClientImpl
    public interface UserClient
extends Subject
    Local User client interface.

    • Method Summary

      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void deleteAccount()
      Method used to delete the currently logged in account from the database.
      void editUserDetails​(User user)
      Method used to edit the currently logged user's credentials.
      java.util.ArrayList<User> getActiveUsers()
      Method used to get the list of active users from the server.
      java.util.ArrayList<User> getUserList()
      Method used to get the list of users from the database.
      User loginUser​(java.lang.String username, java.lang.String password)
      Method used to login the user into the server.
      void logOut()
      Method used to log out the client from the server.
      void registerAccount​(User user)
      Method used to register an account.
      void startClient()
      Start method for this client, making this class remotely available for the server to communicate with it, whilst also initializing the server callback interface, making use of the Connection class to get access to the server factory interface.

      • Methods inherited from interface dk.via.sep.shared.utils.Subject

        addListener, removeListener

    • Method Detail

      • startClient

        void startClient()
        Start method for this client, making this class remotely available for the server to communicate with it, whilst also initializing the server callback interface, making use of the Connection class to get access to the server factory interface.

      • loginUser

        User loginUser​(java.lang.String username,
               java.lang.String password)
        Method used to login the user into the server. It works by providing a username/password combo, and is expected to return a user object that has that username/password combo from the database. If one is found, it will be returned to the user model, otherwise a null object will be returned, meaning there is no user for the specified credentials.
        Parameters:
        username - user's username
        password - user's password
        Returns:
        the user object retrieved from the server (can be null if no user was found)

      • registerAccount

        void registerAccount​(User user)
        Method used to register an account. Takes as an argument a user object, created by the model, and sends it to the server, and is expected to return true or false, depending if that user exists already or not. If true, it will fire the register success event, if not, the register failed event.
        Parameters:
        user - the user to be registered.

      • logOut

        void logOut()
        Method used to log out the client from the server.

      • getUserList

        java.util.ArrayList<User> getUserList()
        Method used to get the list of users from the database.
        Returns:
        the list of registered users.

      • getActiveUsers

        java.util.ArrayList<User> getActiveUsers()
        Method used to get the list of active users from the server.
        Returns:
        the list of active users.

      • deleteAccount

        void deleteAccount()
        Method used to delete the currently logged in account from the database.

      • editUserDetails

        void editUserDetails​(User user)
        Method used to edit the currently logged user's credentials. Takes a user as an argument that contains the changes made.
        Parameters:
        user - object that contains all changes to be saved.
